summary: Vim version of TextMates Cobalt colour scheme
name: Cobalt-Colour-scheme
description:
This is a Vim version of one of TextMate's default colour schemes, Cobalt. Only designed for GVim.

If you want to follow the development you can find it on Github at http://github.com/dterei/VimCobaltColourScheme

versions.release_notes:
* Improvements to the window dividers
* Tweaks to directory colour

Some tweaks made to improve accuracy. Most of the work was done by Константин Городинский. While I believe this version is more accurate then the old version, I prefer the look of the old, so I have continued the old version as an 'inspired by cobalt' colour scheme here vimscript#3439
